Comments_List: I improved my reading, writing, and speaking in Japanese.
Gained skills across all areas of Japanese language, especially with regards to the importance of pitch when speaking.
I look forward to class and learn a lot everyday. The stories in the textbook were interesting, and our class discussions were enjoyable.
Strengths across the board, including an introduction to the notion of pitch. The textbooks and other materials were, by and large, effective. No major weaknesses to speak of.
Definitely. Instructor's pedagogical methods were effective for language learning.
